PV.content:
Please identify the "Property Value" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: As increasing the weight fraction of PC71BM , the PCEs are gradually increased.

Let's think step by step.

In the given paragraph, the "Property Value" entities are:

1. PCEs (Photovoltaic Conversion Efficiency)
2. Weight fraction of PC71BM (a material used in the solar cell)
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Value of Material Property.

Sure, here are the relevant entities in the paragraph that refer to the value of material properties:

1. PCEs (Photovoltaic Conversion Efficiency) - This is the value of the material property that refers to the efficiency of converting sunlight into electrical energy in a solar cell.
2. Weight fraction of PC71BM - This is the value of the material property that refers to the proportion of a specific material (PC71BM) in the solar cell.

So, the two relevant entities in the paragraph that refer to the value of material properties are:

1. PCEs
2. Weight fraction of PC71BM

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Certainly! Here are the valid entities in the paragraph that refer to the value of material properties, presented in a Markdown table with one column titled "Property Value":

| Property Value |
| --- |
| PCEs |
| Weight fraction of PC71BM |

I hope this helps! Let me know if you have any further questions.
